name: No one is illegal on stolen land
description: Created using the colors found in the Mexico and USA flags, this work aims to subtly highlight the complex interwoven history the countries share. This artwork is a memento made for any human who donates to the Border Kindness organization during the Showcase for a Cause event on 5.20.22. Border Kindness helps asylum-seekers, migrants, refugees, and the displaced with comprehensive services that include food, shelter, clothing, medical care and legal services. Created using Procreate on iPad.
